modName: Gordons got no fans - Bow mod
summary: A simple mod which changes the sheath, pull, equip and shot sound effects of the bows within Skyrim to the voice of Gordon. (Better know as the, "You want some" man.)
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/T3u0WLT.png[/img]

[size=4]Hello ladies and gentlemen! 

[/size][size=3]Today I present to you, Gordons got no Fans bow mod, which changes the standard sounds of the bows within Skyrim, to something a little more humorous! Gordon is a man that has become internet famous within the last couple of weeks, and whats more fun than to attack your enemies not only with a bow, but with him by your side! 

[/size]

[color=#ffd966][size=4]Want to see the mod in action? WATCH THE VIDEO BELOW! [/size][/color]

[youtube]9Ys5X-NfGyI[/youtube]

[color=#ffd966][size=4]Have you not seen the original video? Well todays your lucky day, as I even took the liberty to include that below also for oblivious members who are yet to see the popular video! [/size][/color]

[youtube]sAhEFuq62-I[/youtube] 

NOTE: This is not a serious mod, and is simply something I decided to do for the fun of it. If you have any suggestions as to mods you would like me to produce in the future (Funny or not) then please leave a comment and I will try my best. 

[color=#f1c232][size=4]Thank you, and have fun with the Wealdstone Raider by your side! [/size][/color]


[/center]
author: Fi5h1fishy

files.name: Gordons got no Fans - Bow Mod
